title: URBANopt Electrical Line
description: Schema for an URBANopt Electrical Line object

id.description: Unique id used to refer to this feature within this dataset.

project_id.description: Project which this feature belongs to.

source_name.description: Name of the original data source.

source_id.description: Id of the feature in original data source.

lengths.description: Length (ft) of each segment, generated on export.

total_length.description: Total length (ft) of the line, generated on export.

start_junction_id.description: Id of the junction that this line starts at.

wire_1_phase.description: Phase of wire number 1 (A,B,C,S1,S2 or N). If not filled, wire assumed not to exist

wire_2_phase.description: Phase of wire number 2 (A,B,C,S1,S2 or N). If not filled, wire assumed not to exist

wire_3_phase.description: Phase of wire number 3 (A,B,C,S1,S2 or N). If not filled, wire assumed not to exist

wire_4_phase.description: Phase of wire number 4 (A,B,C,S1,S2 or N). If not filled, wire assumed not to exist

wire_1_height.description: Height of wire 1 in feet. Negative if underground

wire_2_height.description: Height of wire 2 in feet. Negative if underground

wire_3_height.description: Height of wire 3 in feet. Negative if underground

wire_4_height.description: Height of wire 4 in feet. Negative if underground

wire_1_x.description: Horizontal displacement of wire 1 in feet.

wire_2_x.description: Horizontal displacement of wire 2 in feet.

wire_3_x.description: Horizontal displacement of wire 3 in feet.

wire_4_x.description: Horizontal displacement of wire 4 in feet.

end_junction_id.description: Id of the junction that this line ends at.
